title: rtemislive
text:
Welcome

Welcome to the rtemislive online documentation.
 
rtemislive is the graphical interface for rtemis. It is a comprehensive data science web application that provides:

Advanced visualization
Statistical Analyses
Machine Learning, including Clustering, Decomposition, Regression, and Classification

  

 



 


This website was created using Quarto.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
rtemislive is organized in modules. The user can toggle modules ON and OFF using the first drop-down menu on the top right.
Custom installations allow to specify whether a dataset should be pre-loaded and allow setting the initial state of most application settings, including modules and themes.
 The documentation on this site ir organized by module: each chapter, accessible from the navigation in the lest, corresponds to an individual module.
 rtemislive is built on top of rtemis
Data operations, including filtering, selecting and a subset of data aggregation operations, performed in real time using data.table.

title: 2  Data
text:
2.1 Uploading data
rtemislive supports a wide range of file types, including the most popular formats for tabular data.

title: 3  Preprocessing
text: The preprocessing module offers extensive functionality for data preprocessing

title: 5  Heatmap
text: The heatmap module allows plotting heatmaps of the correlation matrix of any number of continuous variables.

title: 6  Graph
text:
Graph theory module:

Visualization
